LSD.description: A highly potent hallucinogenic substance. Far out, maaaan.
LSD.mix_phrase: The mixture turns a rather unassuming color and settles.
LSD.name: lysergic acid diethylamide

MRSA.description: A virulent bacteria that often strikes dirty hospitals.
MRSA.name: MRSA

THC.description: A mild psychoactive chemical extracted from the cannabis plant.
THC.name: tetrahydrocannabinol

VHFCS.description: An incredibly sweet syrup, created from corn syrup treated with enzymes to convert its sugars into fructose.
VHFCS.mix_phrase: The mixture emits a sickly-sweet smell.
VHFCS.name: very-high-fructose corn syrup

acetaldehyde.description: Acetaldehyde is a common industrial chemical. It is a severe irritant.
acetaldehyde.mix_phrase: It smells like a bad hangover in here.
acetaldehyde.name: acetaldehyde

acetic_acid.description: A weak acid that is the main component of vinegar and bad hangovers.
acetic_acid.mix_phrase: It smells like vinegar and a bad hangover in here.
acetic_acid.name: acetic acid

acetone.description: Pure 100% nail polish remover, also works as an industrial solvent.
acetone.mix_phrase: The smell of paint thinner assaults you as the solution bubbles.
acetone.name: acetone

acid.description: A strong mineral acid with the molecular formula H2SO4.
acid.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a sharp acidic tang.
acid.name: sulphuric acid

alcoholic_parent.description: You shouldn't be seeing this ingame. If you do, report it to a coder.
alcoholic_parent.name: alcoholic reagent parent

aluminium.description: A silvery white and ductile member of the boron group of chemical elements.
aluminium.name: aluminium

amanitin.description: A toxin produced by certain mushrooms. Very deadly.
amanitin.name: amanitin

ammonia.description: A caustic substance commonly used in fertilizer or household cleaners.
ammonia.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles, emitting an acrid reek.
ammonia.name: ammonia

anima.description: Anima ... The animating force of the universe.
anima.name: anima

anti_fart.description: This strange liquid seems to have no bubbles on the surface.
anti_fart.name: simethicone

anti_rad.description: Potassium Iodide is a medicinal drug used to counter the effects of radiation poisoning.
anti_rad.mix_phrase: The solution settles calmly and emits gentle fumes.
anti_rad.name: potassium iodide

antihistamine.description: Anti-allergy medication. May cause drowsiness, do not operate heavy machinery while using this.
antihistamine.name: diphenhydramine

antihol.description: A medicine which quickly eliminates alcohol in the body.
antihol.mix_phrase: A minty and refreshing smell drifts from the effervescent mixture.
antihol.name: antihol

antiviral.description: An agent which can be used to create a specialized cure for a viral pathogen.
antiviral.name: Viral Serum

ants.description: A sample of a lost breed of Space Ants (formicidae bastardium tyrannus), they are well-known for ravaging the living shit out of pretty much anything.
ants.name: ants

aranesp.description: An illegal performance enhancing drug. Side effects might include chest pain, seizures, swelling, headache, fever... ... ...
aranesp.name: aranesp

argine.description: This strange material seems to ignite & explode on low temperatures.
argine.name: argine

ash.description: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust.
ash.name: ash

atropine.description: Atropine is a potent cardiac resuscitant but it can causes confusion, dizzyness and hyperthermia.
atropine.mix_phrase: A horrid smell like something died drifts from the mixture.
atropine.name: atropine

b_russian.description: A vodka-infused coffee cocktail. Supposedly created in honor of a US Ambassador that no one remembers.
b_russian.mix_phrase: The drink turns a deep brown as the coffee settles in.
b_russian.name: Black Russian

bacon_grease.description: Hook me up to an IV of that sweet, sweet stuff!
bacon_grease.name: pure bacon grease

bacterialmedium.description: A solution useful for the cultivation of bacteria.
bacterialmedium.name: Bacterial Medium

badgrease.description: An oil derived from extra-terrestrial soybeans, with additional hydrogen atoms added to convert it into a saturated form.
badgrease.mix_phrase: The mixture emits a burnt, oily smell.
badgrease.name: partially hydrogenated space-soybean oil

banana peel.description: Banana peel crushed up to a liquid.
banana peel.name: banana peel

bathsalts.description: Sometimes packaged as a refreshing bathwater additive, these crystals are definitely not for human consumption.
bathsalts.mix_phrase: Tiny cubic crystals precipitate out of the mixture. Huh.
bathsalts.name: bath salts

beach.description: Fun fact: the name of this cocktail was deemed a war crime in 2025.
beach.mix_phrase: You die a little inside after making that.
beach.name: Sex on the Beach

bee.description: The yolk from a space bee egg.
bee.name: bee

beepskybeer.description: A dark German beer, typically served with dark bread, cream cheese, and an intense appreciation for the law.
beepskybeer.mix_phrase: The beer is filled briefly by thousands of brilliant, tiny electrical arcs before growing calm and dark.
beepskybeer.name: Beepskybräu Security Schwarzbier

beer.description: An alcoholic beverage made from malted grains, hops, yeast, and water.
beer.name: beer

beff.description: An advanced blend of mechanically-recovered meat and textured synthesized protein product notable for its unusual crystalline grain when sliced.
beff.mix_phrase: The mixture solidifies, taking a crystalline appearance.
beff.name: beff

big_bang.mix_phrase: A tiny point of light blooms within the material, and quickly grows to envelop the entire container. Your life flashes before your eyes.
big_bang.name: quark-gluon plasma

big_bang_precursor.description: This is a strange viscous fluid that seems to have the properties of both a liquid and a gas.
big_bang_precursor.mix_phrase: The solution settles and congeals into a strange viscous fluid that seems to have the properties of both a liquid and a gas.
big_bang_precursor.name: stable bose-einstein macro-condensate

bilk.description: This appears to be beer mixed with milk.
bilk.mix_phrase: The mixture turns an offensive brown colour and begins fizzing.
bilk.name: bilk

biocide.description: An agent which can be used to create a specialized cure for a fungal or parasitic pathogen.
biocide.name: Biocide

bitters.description: Extremely bitter extract used to flavor cocktails. Not recommended for consumption on its own.
bitters.name: bitters

black_goop.description: You're not even sure what this is. It's pretty grody.
black_goop.name: gross black goop

blackpowder.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a granular black powder.
blackpowder.name: black powder

blood.description: A substance found in many living creatures.
blood.name: blood

bloody_mary.mix_phrase: The vodka and tomato juice mix together nicely.
bloody_mary.name: Bloody Mary

bloody_scary.description: A mix of vodka and the blood of a terrible Other Thing.
bloody_scary.mix_phrase: The blood feverishly tries to escape the burn of the vodka, but eventually succumbs.
bloody_scary.name: Bloody Scary

boilpee.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles and gives off a sharp odor.
boilpee.name: Boiled Pee

bojack.description: A strong beverage. Drinking this will put hair on your chest. Maybe.
bojack.name: Bo Jack Daniel's

boorbon.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from maize.  Also ghosts.
boorbon.mix_phrase: The bourbon and ectoplasm mix together, forming a HORRIFYING BLEND.
boorbon.name: BOOrbon

booster_enzyme.description: This booster enzyme helps the body to replicate beneficial chemicals.
booster_enzyme.mix_phrase: The solution shows signs of life, forming shapes!
booster_enzyme.name: booster enzyme

bourbon.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from maize.
bourbon.name: bourbon

bull.mix_phrase: The coffee and tequila mix together. Liqueur? Who needs it?
bull.name: Brave Bull

calomel.description: This potent purgative rids the body of impurities. It is highly toxic however and close supervision is required.
calomel.mix_phrase: Stinging vapors rise from the solution.
calomel.name: calomel

capsaicin.description: A potent irritant produced by pepper plants in the Capsicum genus.
capsaicin.name: capsaicin

capulettium.description: A rare drug that causes the user to appear dead for some time."
capulettium.mix_phrase: The smell of death wafts from the solution.
capulettium.name: capulettium

capulettium_plus.description: A rare and expensive drug that causes the user to appear dead for some time while they retain consciousness and vision."
capulettium_plus.mix_phrase: The solution begins to slosh about violently by itself.
capulettium_plus.name: capulettium plus

carbon.description: A chemical element critical to organic chemistry.
carbon.name: carbon

carpet.description: A covering of thick fabric used on floors. This type looks particularly gross.
carpet.mix_phrase: The substance turns thick and stiff, yet soft.
carpet.name: carpet

catonium.description: An herbal extract noted for its peculiar effect on felines.
catonium.name: catonium

champagne.description: A fizzy alcoholic beverage derived from grapes, made in Champagne, France.
champagne.name: champagne

charcoal.description: Activated charcoal helps to absorb toxins.
charcoal.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a fine black powder.
charcoal.name: charcoal

cheese.description: Some cheese. Pour it out to make it solid.
cheese.name: cheese

chickensoup.description: An old household remedy for mild illnesses.
chickensoup.name: chicken soup

chocolate.description: Chocolate is a delightful product derived from the seeds of the theobroma cacao tree.
chocolate.name: chocolate

chocolate milk.mix_phrase: The mixture turns a nice brown color.
chocolate milk.name: Chocolate Milk

chocolate_milk.description: Chocolate-flavored milk, tastes like being a kid again.
chocolate_milk.name: chocolate milk

cholesterol.description: Pure cholesterol. Probably not very good for you.
cholesterol.name: cholesterol

cider.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from apples.
cider.name: cider

clacid.description: A strong acid with the molecular formula HCl.
clacid.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a sharp acidic tang.
clacid.name: hydrochloric acid

cleaner.description: A compound used to clean things. It has a sharp, unpleasant odor."
cleaner.mix_phrase: Ick, this stuff really stinks. Sure does make the container sparkle though!
cleaner.name: space cleaner

cocktail_citrus.description: A refreshing mixed drink of orange, lemon and lime juice.
cocktail_citrus.mix_phrase: The citrus juices begin to blend together.
cocktail_citrus.name: triple citrus

coconut_milk.description: Well, it's not actually milk, considering that coconuts aren't mammals with mammary glands. It's really more like coconut juice. Or coconut water.
coconut_milk.name: coconut milk

coffee.description: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted seeds, commonly called coffee beans, of the coffee plant.
coffee.name: coffee

colors.description: It's pure liquid colors. That's a thing now.
colors.mix_phrase: The substance flashes multiple colors and emits the smell of a pocket protector.
colors.name: colorful reagent

coniine.description: A neurotoxin that rapidly causes respiratory failure.
coniine.name: coniine"

copper_nitrate.mix_phrase: The mixture forms into a blue crystalline solid.
copper_nitrate.name: copper nitrate

cornstarch.description: The powdered starch of maize, derived from the kernel's endosperm. Used as a thickener for gravies and puddings.
cornstarch.name: corn starch

cornsyrup.description: A sweet syrup derived from corn starch that has had its starches converted into maltose and other sugars.
cornsyrup.mix_phrase: The mixture forms a viscous, clear fluid!
cornsyrup.name: corn syrup

cosmo.description: Well, at least it's not giving awful dating advice.
cosmo.mix_phrase: The drink turns a bright pink.
cosmo.name: Cosmopolitan

crank.description: A cheap and dirty stimulant drug, commonly used by space biker gangs.
crank.mix_phrase: The mixture violently reacts, leaving behind a few crystalline shards.
crank.name: crank"

cryostylane.description: An incredibly cold substance.  Used in many high-demand cooling systems.
cryostylane.mix_phrase: A light layer of frost forms on top of the mixture.
cryostylane.name: cryostylane

cryostylane_cold.mix_phrase: The mixture begins to rapidly freeze.
cryostylane_cold.name: cryostylane chilling

cryoxadone.description: A plasma mixture with almost magical healing powers. Its main limitation is that the targets body temperature must be under 265K for it to metabolise correctly.
cryoxadone.name: cryoxadone

cyanide.description: A highly toxic chemical with some uses as a building block for other things.
cyanide.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a faint scent of almonds.
cyanide.name: cyanide

cyclopentanol.description: A substance not particularly worth noting.
cyclopentanol.mix_phrase: The mixture fizzles into a colorless liquid.
cyclopentanol.name: cyclopentanol

daiquiri.description: Rum with some lime juice and sugar.
daiquiri.mix_phrase: The rum pairs nicely with the sugar and lime.
daiquiri.name: Daiquiri

dbreath.description: Possessing this stuff probably breaks the Geneva convention.
dbreath.mix_phrase: A tiny mushroom cloud erupts from the container. That's not worrying at all!
dbreath.name: Dragon's Breath

death_spice.description: Despite its name, this sweet-smelling black powder is completely harmless. Maybe.
death_spice.name: death spice

denatured_enzyme.description: Heated beyond usefulness, this enzyme is now worthless.
denatured_enzyme.mix_phrase: The solution burns, leaving behind a lifeless mass!
denatured_enzyme.name: denatured enzyme

diethylamine.description: A secondary amine, useful as a plant nutrient and as building block for other compounds.
diethylamine.mix_phrase: A horrible smell pours forth from the mixture.
diethylamine.name: diethylamine

diluted_fliptonium.description: You're a rude dude with a rude 'tude.
diluted_fliptonium.mix_phrase: The mixture swirls around in a kinda lackluster way. You feel pretty unimpressed.
diluted_fliptonium.name: diluted fliptonium

dna_mutagen.description: Just the regular, boring sort of mutagenic compound.  Works in a completely predictable manner.
dna_mutagen.mix_phrase: The substance turns a drab green and begins to bubble.
dna_mutagen.name: stable mutagen

e.coli.description: A nasty bacteria found in contaminated food and biological waste products.
e.coli.name: e.coli bacteria

ectocooler.description: Said to taste exactly like a proton beam. Considering anyone who's tried to taste a proton beam has lost their jaws, it's hard to say where this idea came from.
ectocooler.mix_phrase: The orange juice turns an unsettlingly vibrant shade of green.
ectocooler.name: Ecto Cooler

ectoplasm.description: A bizarre gelatinous substance supposedly derived from ghosts.
ectoplasm.name: ectoplasm

egg.description: A runny and viscous mixture of clear and yellow fluids.
egg.name: egg

eggnog.description: A festive dairy drink made with beaten eggs.
eggnog.mix_phrase: The eggs nog together. Pretend that \"nog\" is a verb.
eggnog.name: egg nog

el_diablo.description: Rumored to be the tears of the devil himself.
el_diablo.name: El Diablo chili

energydrink.description: An energy drink is a liquid plastic with a high amount of caffeine.
energydrink.mix_phrase: The solution emits a tutti frutti stench.
energydrink.name: energy drink

enriched_msg.description: This highly illegal substance was only rumored to exist, it is the most flavorful substance known. It is believed that it causes such euphoria that the body begins to heal its own wounds, however no living creature can resist having seconds.
enriched_msg.mix_phrase: The mixture reduces into a fine crystalline powder and an unbelievably delicious smell wafts upwards.
enriched_msg.name: Enriched MSG

ephedrine.mix_phrase: The solution fizzes and gives off toxic fumes.
ephedrine.name: ephedrine

epichlorohydrin.mix_phrase: The mixture gives of a garlic-like odor.
epichlorohydrin.name: Epichlorohydrin

epinephrine.description: Epinephrine is a potent neurotransmitter, used in medical emergencies to halt anaphylactic shock and prevent cardiac arrest.
epinephrine.mix_phrase: Tiny white crystals precipitate out of the solution.
epinephrine.name: epinephrine

eraser.description: Holy shit, you're getting a buzz just looking at this!
eraser.mix_phrase: The coffee, tonic, and vodka separate into dangerously drinkable layers.
eraser.name: Mind Eraser

essenceofelvis.description: The King is dead, but a part of him lives on in all of us.
essenceofelvis.name: essence of Elvis

ethanol.description: A well-known alcohol with a variety of applications.
ethanol.name: ethanol

ether.description: A strong but highly addictive anesthetic and sedative.
ether.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a pungent odor, which makes you tired.
ether.name: ether

fake_initropidril.description: A highly potent toxin - can kill within minutes.
fake_initropidril.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the unpleasant milky substance.
fake_initropidril.name: initropidril

fakecheese.description: A cheese-like substance derived loosely from actual cheese.
fakecheese.name: cheese substitute

fartonium.description: Oh god it never ends, IT NEVER STOPS!
fartonium.mix_phrase: The substance makes a little 'toot' noise and starts to smell pretty bad.
fartonium.name: fartonium

fermid.mix_phrase: The ants begin to rapidly mutate!
fermid.name: Fermid

ff-foam.description: Carbon Tetrachloride is a foam used for fire suppression.
ff-foam.name: firefighting foam

firedust.description: And this is solid fire. However that works.
firedust.mix_phrase: The substance becomes a pile of burning dust.
firedust.name: phlogiston dust

flaptonium.mix_phrase: The substance turns an airy sky-blue and foams up into a new shape."
flaptonium.name: flaptonium

flash.mix_phrase: The chemicals catch fire, burning brightly and violently!
flash.name: Flash

flashpowder.description: Produces a bright flash of light when heated.
flashpowder.mix_phrase: The chemicals hiss and fizz briefly before falling still.
flashpowder.name: flash powder

fluorosurfactant.description: A perfluoronated sulfonic acid that forms a foam when mixed with water.
fluorosurfactant.name: fluorosurfactant

foam.mix_phrase: The mixture quickly and violently erupts into bubbles!
foam.name: Foam

foam surfactant.mix_phrase: A head of foam results from the mixture's constant fizzing.
foam surfactant.name: Foam surfactant

foof.description: Dioxygen Diflouride, a ludicrously powerful oxidizer. Run away.
foof.name: FOOF

formaldehyde.description: Formaldehyde is a common industrial chemical and is used to preserve corpses and medical samples. It is highly toxic and irritating. Casualdehyde is the less invasive form of this chemical.
formaldehyde.mix_phrase: Ugh, it smells like the morgue in here.
formaldehyde.name: embalming fluid

french75.mix_phrase: The drink fizzes and turns a dark gold.
french75.name: French 75

fuel.description: A highly flammable blend of basic hydrocarbons, mostly Acetylene. Useful for both welding and organic chemistry, and can be fortified into a heavier oil.
fuel.name: welding fuel

fungalmedium.description: A solution encouraging the growth of fungi.
fungalmedium.name: Fungal Medium

gcheese.description: Hell, I don't even know if this IS cheese. Whatever it is, it ain't normal. If you want to, pour it out to make it solid.
gcheese.mix_phrase: The disgusting mixture sloughs together horribly, emitting a foul stench.
gcheese.name: weird cheese

gchronic.mix_phrase: Dude. Dude. You're, like, a genius.
gchronic.name: Gin and Chronic

ghostchilijuice.description: Juice from the universe's hottest chilli. Do not consume.
ghostchilijuice.name: ghost chili juice

gimlet.description: So named because you're a tool if you drink it.
gimlet.mix_phrase: The gin attempts to hide its pine cone flavor in the lime juice.
gimlet.name: Gimlet

gin.description: A strong alcoholic beverage that tastes heavily of juniper.
gin.name: gin

ginfizz.description: Don't question how it's fizzing without seltzer.
ginfizz.mix_phrase: The mixed drink starts fizzing on its own. Somehow.
ginfizz.name: Gin Fizz

glitter.mix_phrase: The mixture becomes far more fabulous!
glitter.name: glitter

glowing_fliptonium.description: There's something kinda weird about this stuff. Something off. Something... spooky.
glowing_fliptonium.mix_phrase: The mixture swirls around and begins to glow strangely!
glowing_fliptonium.name: glowing fliptonium

glue.description: Hopefully you weren't the kind of kid to eat this stuff.
glue.name: glue

glycerol.description: A sweet, non-toxic, viscous liquid. It is widely used as an additive.
glycerol.name: glycerol

gpink.description: A gin and tonic for people who think the gin gets in the way.
gpink.mix_phrase: The gin and tonic gets even more bitter. Way to go!
gpink.name: Pink Gin and Tonic

grave dust.description: Moldy old dust taken from a grave site.
grave dust.name: grave dust

gravy.description: A savory sauce made from a simple meat-dripping roux and milk.
gravy.mix_phrase: The substance thickens and takes on a meaty odor.
gravy.name: gravy

grease.description: An oil derived from extra-terrestrial soybeans.
grease.name: space-soybean oil

green_goop.description: A foul substance that seems to quiver oddly near certain spots.
green_goop.name: strange green goop

grog.description: A highly caustic and nigh-undrinkable substance often associated with piracy.
grog.mix_phrase: The substance mixes together, emitting a rank piratey odor and seemingly dissolving some of the container...
grog.name: grog

gtonic.description: Once made to make bitter medication taste better, now drunk for its flavor.
gtonic.mix_phrase: The tonic water and gin mix together perfectly.
gtonic.name: Gin and Tonic

guacamole.description: A paste comprised primarily of avocado.
guacamole.name: guacamole

gvomit.description: Whoa, that can't be natural. That's horrible.
gvomit.name: green vomit

hairgrownium.description: A mysterious chemical purported to help grow hair. Often found on late-night TV infomercials.
hairgrownium.name: hairgrownium

halfandhalf.description: A mixture of half lemonade and half tea, sometimes named after a dead Earth golfer. Not to be confused with the dairy kind.
halfandhalf.mix_phrase: The tea and lemonade combine without much fuss.
halfandhalf.name: half and half

haloperidol.description: Haloperidol is a powerful antipsychotic and sedative. Will help control psychiatric problems, but may cause brain damage.
haloperidol.mix_phrase: The chemicals mix into an odd pink slush.
haloperidol.name: haloperidol

harlow.description: A.K.A. that one actress who would have played Fay Wray's part in King Kong if she hadn't died.
harlow.mix_phrase: The ghosts of starlets past waft by.
harlow.name: Jean Harlow

heartworms.description: Aww, gross! These things can't be good for your heart. They're gunna eat it!
heartworms.name: space heartworms

histamine.description: Immune-system neurotransmitter. If detected in blood, the subject is likely undergoing an allergic reaction.
histamine.name: histamine"

honey.description: A sweet substance produced by bees through partial digestion.  Bee barf.
honey.name: honey

honey_tea.description: An aromatic beverage derived from the leaves of the camellia sinensis plant. There's a little bit of honey in it.
honey_tea.mix_phrase: The tea somehow smells even nicer than before.
honey_tea.name: tea

hugs.description: Hugs, in liquid form.  Yes, the concept of a hug.  As a liquid.  This makes sense in the future.
hugs.name: pure hugs

hunchback.description: An alleged cocktail invented by a notorious scientist. Useful in a pinch as an impromptu purgative, or interrogation tool.
hunchback.mix_phrase: The chunks of tomato paste hang in the bourbon and cola as an emulsion. It looks as horrible as that sounds.
hunchback.name: Hunchback

hydrogen.description: A colorless, odorless, nonmetallic, tasteless, highly combustible diatomic gas.
hydrogen.name: hydrogen

ice.description: It's frozen water. What did you expect?!
ice.name: ice

infernite.description: An extremely volatile substance, handle with the utmost care.
infernite.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off significant heat.
infernite.name: chlorine triflouride

inhibitor.description: An agent which can be used to create a specialized cure for a cellular mutative pathogen
inhibitor.name: Mutation Inhibitor

initrobeedril.description: A highly experimental poison originally created by a mad scientist by the name of \"SpyGuy\" on earth in 2014.
initrobeedril.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the golden substance.
initrobeedril.name: initrobeedril

initrobeedril_old.description: A highly experimental poison originally created by a mad scientist by the name of \"SpyGuy\" on earth in 2014.
initrobeedril_old.name: old initrobeedril

initropidril.description: A highly potent cardiac poison - can kill within minutes.
initropidril.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the unpleasant milky substance.
initropidril.name: initropidril

insulin.description: A hormone generated by the pancreas responsible for metabolizing carbohydrates and fat in the bloodstream.
insulin.name: insulin

irishcoffee.mix_phrase: The drink turns a rich brown and smells like a hangover.
irishcoffee.name: Irish Coffee

ironlfoam.mix_phrase: The metal begins to foam up, becoming rigid and tough!
ironlfoam.name: Iron Foam

itching.description: An abrasive powder beloved by cruel pranksters.
itching.mix_phrase: The mixture congeals and dries up, leaving behind an abrasive powder.
itching.name: itching powder

jenkem.description: Jenkem is a prison drug made from fermenting feces in a solution of urine. Extremely disgusting.
jenkem.mix_phrase: The mixture ferments into a filthy morass.
jenkem.name: jenkem

juice_cherry.description: The juice from a thousand screaming cherries.  Silent screams.
juice_cherry.name: cherry juice

juice_cran.description: An extremely tart juice usually mixed into other drinks and juices.
juice_cran.name: Cranberry juice

juice_lemon.description: A citric beverage extracted from lemons.
juice_lemon.name: lemon juice

juice_lime.description: A citric beverage extracted from limes.
juice_lime.name: lime juice

juice_orange.description: A citric beverage extracted from oranges.
juice_orange.name: orange juice

juice_pickle.description: A salty brine containing garlic and dill, typically used to ferment and pickle cucumbers.
juice_pickle.name: pickle juice

juice_pineapple.description: Juice from a pineapple. A surprise, considering the name!
juice_pineapple.name: pineapple juice

juice_tomato.description: Tomatoes pureed down to a liquid state.
juice_tomato.name: tomato juice

kerosene.description: A substance widely applied as fuel for aviation vehicles and solvent for metal alloys (when heated).
kerosene.mix_phrase: This pungent odor could probably melt steel.
kerosene.name: kerosene

ketchup.description: A condiment often used on hotdogs and sandwiches.
ketchup.name: ketchup

krokodil.description: A sketchy homemade opiate, often used by disgruntled Cosmonauts.
krokodil.mix_phrase: The mixture dries into a pale blue powder.
krokodil.name: krokodil

ldmatter.description: What has science done ... It's concentrated dark matter in liquid form. And i thought you needed plutonic quarks for that.
ldmatter.name: liquid dark matter

ldmatterstable.mix_phrase: The begins to glow in a dark purple.
ldmatterstable.name: Stable Liquid Dark Matter

lemonade.description: A refreshing, sweet and sour drink consisting of sugar and lemon juice.
lemonade.mix_phrase: The sugar dissolves into the lemon juice.
lemonade.name: lemonade

lexorin.description: Lexorin temporarily stops respiration. Causes tissue damage.
lexorin.name: lexorin

libre.description: Made to celebrate the liberation of Space Cuba in 2028.
libre.mix_phrase: You shed a single patriotic tear as the drink comes together.
libre.name: Space-Cuba Libre

life.description: Just a placeholder thing, you shouldn't be seeing this!
life.mix_phrase: The substance begins to wriggle disgustingly and climbs out of its container!
life.name: life

lipolicide.description: A compound found in many seedy dollar stores in the form of a weight-loss tonic.
lipolicide.mix_phrase: A vague smell similar to tofu rises from the mixture.
lipolicide.name: lipolicide

longbeach.description: For when you want a healthier glass of knocks-you-the-fuck-out.
longbeach.mix_phrase: The frightening amount of liquor in the container balances out with the lemon juice and sours.
longbeach.name: Long Beach Iced Tea

longisland.description: Preferred by housewives, raging alcoholics, and the rather large overlap between them.
longisland.mix_phrase: The frightening amount of liquor in the container balances out with the cola and sours.
longisland.name: Long Island Iced Tea

love.description: What is this emotion you humans call \"love?\"  Oh, it's this?  This is it? Huh, well okay then, thanks.
love.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a lovely scent!
love.name: pure love

lube.description: Lubricant is a substance introduced between two moving surfaces to reduce the friction and wear between them. giggity.
lube.mix_phrase: The substance turns a striking cyan and becomes oily.
lube.name: space lube

luminol.description: A chemical that can detect trace amounts of blood.
luminol.name: luminol

madmen.description: The favorite drink of unfaithful, alcoholic executives in really nice suits.
madmen.mix_phrase: The cocktail gets back to basics.
madmen.name: Old Fashioned

madness_toxin.description: A synthetic version of a potent neurotoxin derived from plants capable of driving a person to madness. First discovered in India by a Belgian reporter in 1931.
madness_toxin.mix_phrase: The mixture forms a clear greenish liquid, emitting a nauseating smell reminiscent of chlorophyll and rubbing alcohol.
madness_toxin.name: Rajaijah

magnesium_chloride.description: A white powder that's capable of binding a high amount of ammonia while on room temperature.
magnesium_chloride.mix_phrase: The mixture settles into a white powder.
magnesium_chloride.name: magnesium chloride

maitai.description: Even in space, you can't escape Tiki drinks.
maitai.mix_phrase: A little pink umbrella magically appears in the drink.
maitai.name: Mai Tai

manhattan.description: For the alcoholic who doesn't quite want to drink straight from the bottle yet.
manhattan.mix_phrase: The unmistakable smell of a power lunch wafts from the container.
manhattan.name: Manhattan

mannitol.description: Mannitol is a sugar alcohol that can help alleviate cranial swelling.
mannitol.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles slowly, making a slightly sweet odor.
mannitol.name: mannitol

margarita.description: Something something Jimmy Buffet something something dated references.
margarita.mix_phrase: The tequila and citrus pair together like old, alcoholic friends.
margarita.name: Margarita

mashedpotatoes.description: A starchy food paste made from boiled potatoes.
mashedpotatoes.name: mashed potatoes

mead.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from honey.
mead.name: mead

meat_slurry.description: A paste comprised of highly-processed organic material. Uncomfortably similar to deviled ham spread.
meat_slurry.mix_phrase: The mixture congeals into a bloody mass.
meat_slurry.name: meat slurry

metalfoam.mix_phrase: The metal begins to foam up!
metalfoam.name: Metal Foam

methamphetamine.description: Methamphetamine is a highly effective and dangerous stimulant drug.
methamphetamine.mix_phrase: The solution fizzes and gives off toxic fumes.
methamphetamine.name: methamphetamine

mg_nh3_cl.description: A white powder binding a high amount of ammonia. The ammonia is released when the mixture is heated above 150 degrees celsius.
mg_nh3_cl.name: magnesium-ammonium chloride

milk.description: An opaque white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals.
milk.name: milk

mimosa.description: Not a flower, but a sweet cocktail typically served at formal functions.
mimosa.mix_phrase: The drink fizzes as the pulp settles to the top.
mimosa.name: Mimosa

moonshine.description: An illegaly brewed and highly potent alcoholic beverage.
moonshine.name: moonshine

morphine.description: A strong but highly addictive opiate painkiller with sedative side effects.
morphine.name: morphine

msg.description: Monosodium Glutamate is a sodium salt known chiefly for its use as a controversial flavor enhancer.
msg.name: monosodium glutamate

mucus.description: The stuff that comes from your throat.
mucus.name: mucus

mugwort.description: A rather bitter herb once thought to hold magical protective properties.
mugwort.name: mugwort

mustard.description: A condiment often used on hotdogs and sandwiches.
mustard.name: mustard

mutadone.description: Mutadone is an experimental bromide that can cure genetic abnomalities.
mutadone.mix_phrase: A foul astringent liquid emerges from the reaction.
mutadone.name: mutadone

mutagen.description: Might cause unpredictable mutations. Keep away from children.
mutagen.mix_phrase: The substance turns neon green and bubbles unnervingly.
mutagen.name: unstable mutagen

mutagen2.mix_phrase: An unpleasant, shifting green mass of liquid forms from the reaction.
mutagen2.name: Strange Toxin

napalm.description: It appears to be liquid fire.
napalm.mix_phrase: The substance erupts into wild flames.
napalm.name: phlogiston

napalm_goo.mix_phrase: The mixture congeals into a sticky gel.
napalm_goo.name: napalm

necroni.description: A hellish cocktail that stinks of rotting garbage.
necroni.mix_phrase: The drink gives off a haunting stench! What did you make?
necroni.name: Necroni

nectar.description: A sweet liquid produced by plants to attract pollinators.
nectar.name: nectar

negroni.mix_phrase: The drink turns a deep red and gives off a hit of sweetness.
negroni.name: Negroni

neurotoxin.description: A dangerous toxin that attacks the nervous system
neurotoxin.name: neurotoxin

nicotine.description: A highly addictive stimulant extracted from the tobacco plant.
nicotine.name: nicotine

nitric_acid.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a sharp acidic tang.
nitric_acid.name: nitric acid

nitrogen_dioxide.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a biting odor.
nitrogen_dioxide.name: Nitrogen Dioxide

nitroglycerin.description: A miracle worker in treating cardiac failure. Very, very volatile and sensitive compound. Do not run while handling this. Do not throw this. Do not splash this.
nitroglycerin.mix_phrase: The mixture becomes seemingly heavy and viscous.
nitroglycerin.name: nitroglycerin

nitrotri_dry.description: A chemical that is stable when in liquid form, but becomes extremely volatile when dry. This is dry. Uh oh.

nitrotri_parent.description: A chemical that is stable when in liquid form, but becomes extremely volatile when dry.
nitrotri_parent.name: Nitrogen Triiodide

no_fermid_foam.mix_phrase: A single fermid leg reaches out of the container. It flips you off. Somehow.
no_fermid_foam.name: no fermid foam

no_pyrosium_foam.mix_phrase: The mixture burns away into nothing!
no_pyrosium_foam.name: no pyrosium foam

no_pyrosium_smoke.mix_phrase: The mixture burns away into nothing!
no_pyrosium_smoke.name: no pyrosium smoke

no_pyrosium_smoke2.mix_phrase: The mixture burns away into nothing!
no_pyrosium_smoke2.name: no pyrosium smoke 2

oculine.description: Oculine is a combined eye and ear medication with antibiotic effects.
oculine.mix_phrase: The mixture settles, becoming a milky white.
oculine.name: oculine

ohfuck!.description: if you're seeing this ingame something has fucked up!
ohfuck!.name: disease reagent

oil.description: A decent lubricant for machines. High in benzene, naptha and other hydrocarbons.
oil.mix_phrase: An iridescent black chemical forms in the container.
oil.name: oil

omega_mutagen.description: This is probably not good for you.
omega_mutagen.name: glowing slurry

omnizine.description: Omnizine is a highly potent healing medication that can be used to treat a wide range of injuries.
omnizine.name: omnizine

pacid.description: Fluorosulfuric acid is a an extremely corrosive super-acid.
pacid.mix_phrase: The mixture deepens to a dark blue, and slowly begins to corrode its container.
pacid.name: fluorosulfuric acid

packing_peanuts.description: Those little white things you get when you order stuff in boxes. Not to be confused with ghost poop.
packing_peanuts.name: packing peanuts

painbow fluid.description: It is every colour of the pain spectrum. It even hurts to look at it.
painbow fluid.name: painbow fluid

pancuronium.description: Pancuronium bromide is a powerful skeletal muscle relaxant.
pancuronium.name: pancuronium

paper.description: Little flecks of paper, all torn up.
paper.name: paper

parasiticmedium.description: A solution useful for the cultivation of parasites.
parasiticmedium.name: Parasitic Medium

pathogen.description: A liquid sample of one (or multiple) pathogens.
pathogen.name: pathogen

penteticacid.description: Pentetic Acid is an aggressive chelation agent. May cause tissue damage. Use with caution.
penteticacid.mix_phrase: The substance becomes very still, emitting a curious haze.
penteticacid.name: pentetic acid

pepperoni.description: An Italian-American variety of salami usually made from beef and pork
pepperoni.mix_phrase: The beff and the synthflesh combine to form a smoky red log.
pepperoni.name: pepperoni

perfluorodecalin.description: This experimental perfluoronated solvent has applications in liquid breathing and tissue oxygenation. Use with caution.
perfluorodecalin.mix_phrase: The mixture rapidly turns into a dense pink liquid.
perfluorodecalin.name: perfluorodecalin

pfire.description: The leading cause of flaming toilets across the galaxy.
pfire.mix_phrase: The hot sauce and tequila mix to create a frat boy's worst nightmare.
pfire.name: Prairie Fire

phenol.description: Also known as carbolic acid, this is a useful building block in organic chemistry.
phenol.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles and gives off an unpleasant medicinal odor.
phenol.name: phenol

pinacolada.description: I don't really like being caught in the rain all that much, to be honest.
pinacolada.mix_phrase: The drink gives off the smell of a rainy beach.
pinacolada.name: Piña Colada

planter.description: A Drink then you'll have that's not bad - / At least, so they say in Jamaica!
planter.mix_phrase: A nicely Jamaican smell wafts out of the container.
planter.name: Planter's Punch

plasma.description: The liquid phase of an unusual extraterrestrial compound.
plasma.name: plasma

pollen.description: A pollen-derivative with a number of proteins and other nutrients vital to space bee health. Not palatable for humans, but at least Russian dissidents have never been killed with it.
pollen.name: pollenium

polonium.description: Polonium is a rare and highly radioactive silvery metal.
polonium.name: polonium

porktonium.description: A highly-radioactive pork byproduct first discovered in hotdogs.
porktonium.name: porktonium

port.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from grapes.
port.mix_phrase: The liquid darkens and emits a strong smell of alcohol.
port.name: port

potash.description: A white crystalline compound, useful for boosting crop yields.
potash.name: potash

potash1.mix_phrase: A white crystalline residue forms as the water boils off.
potash1.name: potash

potash2.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a white crystalline compound.
potash2.name: potash

potassium.description: A soft, low-melting solid that can easily be cut with a knife. Reacts violently with water.
potassium.name: potassium

prions.description: A disease-causing agent that is neither bacterial nor fungal nor viral and contains no genetic material.
prions.name: prions

psilocybin.description: A powerful hallucinogenic chemical produced by certain mushrooms.
psilocybin.name: psilocybin

pubbie tears.description: The most bitter of all liquids.
pubbie tears.name: pubbie tears

radium.description: Radium is an alkaline earth metal. It is highly radioactive.
radium.name: radium

rainbow fluid.description: It is every colour of the rainbow.
rainbow fluid.name: rainbow fluid

refried_beans.description: A dish made of mashed beans cooked with lard.
refried_beans.name: refried beans

reversium.mix_phrase: .ylegnarts dnuora lriws ot snigeb erutxim ehT
reversium.name: reversium

rotting.description: A virus that causes tissue to rot.
rotting.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a terrible stench. Are those maggots?
rotting.name: rotting

royal_initrobeedril.description: A highly experimental poison originally created by a mad scientist by the name of \"SpyGuy\" on earth in 2014.
royal_initrobeedril.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the royal purple substance.
royal_initrobeedril.name: royal initrobeedril

royal_jelly.description: A nutritive gel used to induce extended development in the larvae of greater domestic space-bees.
royal_jelly.name: royal jelly

rum.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from sugar.
rum.name: rum

salbutamol.description: Salbutamol is a common bronchodilation medication for asthmatics. It may help with other breathing problems as well.
salbutamol.mix_phrase: The solution bubbles freely, creating a head of bluish foam.
salbutamol.name: salbutamol

salicylic_acid.description: This is a is a standard salicylate pain reliever and fever reducer.
salicylic_acid.name: salicylic acid

saline.description: This saline and glucose solution can help stabilize critically injured patients and cleanse wounds.
saline.name: saline-glucose solution

salmonella.description: A nasty bacteria found in spoiled food.
salmonella.name: salmonella bacteria

salt.mix_phrase: The solution crystallizes with a brief flare of light.
salt.name: salt

saltpetre.description: Potassium nitrate, commonly used for fertilizer, cured meats and fireworks production.
saltpetre.mix_phrase: A white crystalline substance condenses out of the mixture.
saltpetre.name: saltpetre

salts1.description: Rapid chemical decomposition has warped these crystals into twisted spikes.
salts1.name: jagged crystals

sarin.description: A lethal organophosphate nerve agent. Can be neutralized with atropine.
sarin.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a colorless, odorless liquid.
sarin.name: sarin

screwdriver.description: A tangy mixture of vodka and orange juice.
screwdriver.mix_phrase: The vodka and orange juice mix together nicely.
screwdriver.name: Screwdriver

shark_dna.description: How this was obtained is anyone's guess.
shark_dna.name: space shark DNA

silicate.description: A compound that can be used to reinforce glass.
silicate.mix_phrase: The substance mixes into a clear, viscous liquid.
silicate.name: silicate

silicon.description: A tetravalent metalloid, silicon is less reactive than its chemical analog carbon.
silicon.name: silicon

silver.description: A lustrous metallic element regarded as one of the precious metals.
silver.name: silver

silver_sulfadiazine.description: This antibacterial compound is used to treat burn victims.
silver_sulfadiazine.mix_phrase: A strong and cloying odor begins to bubble from the mixture.
silver_sulfadiazine.name: silver sulfadiazine

smoke.mix_phrase: The mixture quickly turns into a pall of smoke!
smoke.name: Smoke

smokepowder.mix_phrase: The mixture sets into a greyish powder!
smokepowder.name: smoke powder

sodium.description: A soft, silvery-white, highly reactive alkali metal.
sodium.name: sodium

something.description: What is this thing?  None of the normal tests have been able to determine what exactly this is, just that it is benign.
something.mix_phrase: The solution swirls violently and forms...something.
something.name: something

sonic.description: GOTTA GET CRUNK FAST BUT LIQUOR TOO SLOW
sonic.mix_phrase: The drink turns electric blue and starts quivering violently.
sonic.name: Gin and Sonic

sonic_boom.mix_phrase: The mixture begins to bubble furiously!
sonic_boom.name: Hootingium

sonicpowder.description: Produces a loud bang when heated.
sonicpowder.mix_phrase: The mixture begins to bubble slighly!
sonicpowder.name: hootingium

sorium.description: Flammable material that causes a powerful shockwave on detonation.
sorium.mix_phrase: The mixture explodes with a big bang.
sorium.name: sorium

soriumstable.mix_phrase: The mixture pops and crackles before settling down.
soriumstable.name: Stable Sorium

space_drugs.description: An illegal chemical compound used as a cheap drug.
space_drugs.mix_phrase: Slightly dizzying fumes drift from the solution.
space_drugs.name: space drugs

space_fungus.description: Scrapings of some unknown fungus found growing on the station walls.
space_fungus.name: space fungus

spaceacillin.description: An all-purpose antibiotic agent extracted from space fungus.
spaceacillin.mix_phrase: The solvent extracts an antibiotic compound from the fungus.
spaceacillin.name: spaceacillin

spidereggs.description: A fine dust containing ice spider eggs. Oh god.
spidereggs.name: spider eggs

spiders.description: A bunch of tiny little spiders, all crawling around in a big spidery blob.
spiders.name: spiders

squeeze.description: Alcohol made from fuel. Do you really think you should drink this? I think you have a problem. Maybe you should talk to a doctor.
squeeze.mix_phrase: The fuel is filtered through the bread and makes something vaguely consumable.
squeeze.name: squeeze

stabiliser.description: A chemical that stabilises normally volatile compounds, preventing them from reacting immediately.
stabiliser.mix_phrase: The mixture becomes a yellow liquid!
stabiliser.name: stabilising agent

stimulants.description: A dangerous chemical cocktail that allows for seemingly superhuman feats for a short time ...
stimulants.name: stimulants

strange_reagent.description: A glowing green fluid highly reminiscent of nuclear waste.
strange_reagent.mix_phrase: The substance begins moving on its own somehow.
strange_reagent.name: strange reagent

strawberry milk.mix_phrase: The mixture turns a nice pink color.
strawberry milk.name: Strawberry Milk

strawberry_milk.description: Strawberry-flavored milk, tastes like being a kid again.
strawberry_milk.name: strawberry milk

stringy gibbis.description: Liquid gibbis that is very stringy.
stringy gibbis.name: stringy gibbis

strychnine.description: A highly potent neurotoxin in crystalline form. Causes severe convulsions and eventually death by asphyxiation. Has been known to be used as a performance enhancer by certain athletes.
strychnine.name: strychnine

stypic_powder.description: Styptic (aluminium sulfate) powder helps control bleeding and heal physical wounds.
stypic_powder.mix_phrase: The solution yields an astringent powder.
stypic_powder.name: styptic powder

sugar.description: This white, odorless, crystalline powder has a pleasing, sweet taste.
sugar.name: sugar

suicider.description: An unbelievably strong and potent variety of Cider.
suicider.mix_phrase: The drinks and chemicals mix together, emitting a potent smell.
suicider.name: Suicider

sulfonal.description: An old sedative with toxic side-effects.
sulfonal.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off quite a stench.
sulfonal.name: sulfonal

super_hairgrownium.description: A mysterious and powerful chemical purported to cause rapid hair growth.
super_hairgrownium.mix_phrase: The liquid becomes disgustingly furry and smells terrible.
super_hairgrownium.name: super hairgrownium

sweet_tea.description: A solution of sugar and tea, popular in the American South.  Some people raise the sugar levels in it to the point of saturation and beyond.
sweet_tea.name: sweet tea

synaptizine.description: Synaptizine is used to treat neuroleptic shock. Can be used to help remove disabling symptoms such as paralysis.
synaptizine.name: synaptizine

synthflesh.description: A resorbable microfibrillar collagen and protein mixture that can rapidly heal injuries when applied topically.
synthflesh.mix_phrase: The mixture knits together into a fibrous, bloody mass.
synthflesh.name: synthetic flesh

tea.description: An aromatic beverage derived from the leaves of the camellia sinensis plant.
tea.name: tea

teporone.description: This experimental plasma-based compound seems to regulate body temperature.
teporone.mix_phrase: The mixture turns an odd lavender color.
teporone.name: teporone

tequila.description: A somewhat notorious liquor made from agave. One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
tequila.name: tequila

tequini.description: You kinda want to punch whoever came up with this name.
tequini.mix_phrase: James Bond would be deeply confused.
tequini.name: Tequini

thalmerite.description: This strange compound seems to slowly heat up all by itself. Very sticky.
thalmerite.mix_phrase: The resultant gel begins to emit significant heat.
thalmerite.name: pyrosium

thalmerite_heat.mix_phrase: The mixture starts to rapidly fizzle and heat up.
thalmerite_heat.name: thalmerite heating

thermite.description: Thermite burns at an incredibly high temperature. Can be used to melt walls.
thermite.mix_phrase: The solution mixes into a reddish-brown powder.
thermite.name: thermite

tonic.description: Carbonated water with quinine for a bitter flavor. Protects against Space Malaria.
tonic.name: tonic water

toxic_slurry.description: A filthy, carcinogenic sludge produced by the Slurrypod plant.
toxic_slurry.name: toxic slurry

uranium.description: A radioactive heavy metal commonly used for nuclear fission reactions.
uranium.name: uranium

v_gimlet.description: Trading pine cones for rubbing alcohol.
v_gimlet.mix_phrase: The drink comes together and swiftly infuriates cocktail nerds.
v_gimlet.name: Vodka Gimlet

vampire_serum.description: A sinister blood-like fluid. It smells evil, somehow.
vampire_serum.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a coppery stink.
vampire_serum.name: vampire serum

vanilla.description: An expensive spice of the new world. Combination with ice not recommended.
vanilla.name: vanilla

venom.description: An incredibly potent poison. Origin unknown.
venom.name: venom

vermouth.description: A fortified wine with botanicals for flavor.
vermouth.name: vermouth

viral curative.description: A virus that feeds on other virii and bacteria.
viral curative.name: viral curative

vodka.description: A strong alcoholic beverage derived from potatoes.
vodka.name: vodka

voltagen.description: Electricity in pure liquid form. However that works.
voltagen.mix_phrase: The solution settles into a liquid form of electricity.
voltagen.name: voltagen

voltagen_arc.mix_phrase: The solution settles into a liquid form of electricity but violently destabilizes!
voltagen_arc.name: Voltagen Arc

vomit.description: Looks like someone lost their lunch. And then collected it. Yuck.
vomit.name: vomit

vtonic.description: All the bitterness of a gin and tonic, now without any other flavor but alcohol burn!
vtonic.mix_phrase: The tonic water and vodka mix together perfectly.
vtonic.name: Vodka Tonic

water.description: A ubiquitous chemical substance that is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
water.name: water

water_holy.description: Blessed water, supposedly effective against evil.
water_holy.mix_phrase: The water somehow seems purified. Or maybe defiled.
water_holy.name: holy water

wax.description: A lipid compound used in candles and for making haunted sculptures to terrorize Scooby Doo.
wax.name: wax

weedkiller.description: A herbicidal compound used for destroying unwanted plants.
weedkiller.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a harsh odor.
weedkiller.name: atrazine

werewolf_part1.description: A strange and poisonous lupine compound.
werewolf_part1.mix_phrase: The substance burbles distressingly and takes a metallic shine.
werewolf_part1.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Alpha

werewolf_part2.description: A potent and very unstable mutagenic substance.
werewolf_part2.mix_phrase: The substance flashes brilliantly, but quickly subsides.
werewolf_part2.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Beta

werewolf_part3.description: A direct precursor to a special, targeted mutagen.
werewolf_part3.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Gamma

werewolf_part4.description: A flawed isomer of a special, targeted mutagen.  If only it were perfected...
werewolf_part4.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a putrid stench!
werewolf_part4.name: Imperfect Werewolf Serum

werewolf_serum.description: A mutagenic substance associated with a mythical beast.
werewolf_serum.mix_phrase: The substance bubbles and gives off an almost lupine howl.
werewolf_serum.name: werewolf serum

whiskey_sour.description: For the manly man who can't quite stomach straight liquor.
whiskey_sour.mix_phrase: The alcohol burn sneakily disguises itself in the sweet and sour mix.
whiskey_sour.name: Whiskey Sour

wine.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from grapes.
wine.name: wine

wolfsbane.description: Also known as monkshood or wolfsbane, aconitum is a very potent neurotoxin.
wolfsbane.name: Aconitum

yobihodazine.description: A powerful outlawed compound capable of preventing vaccuum damage. Prolonged use leads to neurological damage.
yobihodazine.name: yobihodazine
